name: Canvas Grid Builder
description: A React application displaying a canvas with customizable grid overlays, including a major grid, a subgrid, and a rule of thirds guide, now with an integrated Bitruvius anatomical skeleton.

skeleton.name: Bitruvius Anatomical Model (Extended)
skeleton.description: A hierarchical skeleton derived from the Bitruvius Core Motion spec, now with refined joint taxonomy, extended hand/foot articulation, and color-coded labels for joints and bone segments.
